EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in August 2014
EmailTemplate.name: 26 & 29 September Uniform Shop Closed Rosinka
EmailTemplate.subject: 26 & 29 September Uniform Shop Closed Rosinka
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents,
We would like to inform you that the uniform shop will be closed for 2 days, Friday and Monday, the 26th and 29th of September.
It will open again on Tuesday the 30th operating with normal hours, 8:30am - 4:30pm.
Thank you.
Kind Regards,
Rosinka Team The International School of Moscow World Class Education
